author: Keri Swanson
title: Keri Swanson
text:
I ordered 3 shower curtains only received one.. Where are my other 2 orders.?? I ordered 2 barn doors and the palm trees ., Still missing one barn door an the palm trees.. Please contact me ASAP or REFUND BACK TO MY CARD.. I DON'T WANT TO CALL MY ATTY. Order #bj14884936824210
